Read the given paragraph and find the main theme
In baseball, home-run hitting has been much more difficult in the past few decades, due to the ball being harder, as well as the transformation of stadiums after 1988 to favor pitching.

The main theme of the paragraph is the increased difficulty of hitting home runs in baseball over the past few decades. This challenge is attributed to changes in the hardness of the baseball and the transformation of stadiums to favor pitching since 1988.
